definitions.definition: a person employed for wages or salary, especially at nonexecutive level.
examples: worker, working man/woman, member of staff, staffer; Moreblue-collar worker, white-collar worker, laborer, workingman, hand, hired hand; wage earner; informaldesk jockey; personnel, staff, workforce, human resources "each employee receives a Thanksgiving turkey"Moreblue-collar worker, white-collar worker, laborer, workingman, hand, hired hand; wage earner; desk jockey; personnel, staff, workforce, human resources each employee receives a Thanksgiving turkey
